entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 4:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
